00008 MathMLView::MathMLView(wxWindow *parent)
00009         : wxWindow(parent, -1) {
00010         m_owner = parent;
00011         doc = 0;
00012     m_scale = 1;
00013     mmlpix.setOutline(false);
00014 }
00015 MathMLView::~MathMLView() {
00016         if (doc) {
00017                 delete doc;
00018         }
00019 }
00020 void
00021 MathMLView::setOutline(bool o) {
00022     mmlpix.setOutline(o);
00023     Refresh();
00024 }
00025 void
00026 MathMLView::changeFont(const wxFont &f) {
00027         mmlpix.setFont(f);
00028     updatePix();
00029     GetParent()->Layout();
00030 }
00031 void
00032 MathMLView::setDocument(const MMLDocument *d) {
00033     if (doc != d) {
00034         delete doc;
00035     }
00036     doc = d;
00037     if (doc) {
00038         mmlpix.setDocument(doc);
00039         updatePix();
00040     }
00041         GetParent()->Layout();
00042 }
00043 void
00044 MathMLView::updatePix() {
00045     int w = (int)ceil(m_scale*mmlpix.getWidth());
00046     int h = (int)ceil(m_scale*mmlpix.getHeight());
00047     SetSizeHints(w, h, w, h);
00048 }
00049 const MMLDocument *
00050 MathMLView::document() const {
00051         return doc;
00052 }
00053 void
00054 MathMLView::OnPaint(wxPaintEvent &) {
00055         if (doc) {
00056                 wxPaintDC dc(this);
00057         dc.SetUserScale(m_scale, m_scale);
00058         dc.Blit(0, 0, mmlpix.getWidth(), mmlpix.getHeight(), &mmlpix.getPixmap(), 0, 0);
00059         }
00060 }
00061 void
00062 MathMLView::OnMouseMove(wxMouseEvent &e) {
00063         if (!e.LeftIsDown()) return;
00064         SetFocus();
00065         if (doc) {
00066         float x = e.GetX()/m_scale;
00067         float y = e.GetY()/m_scale;
00068         wxPoint p = mmlpix.getCoords((int)x, (int)y);
00069                 bool change = doc->constcursor()->selectTo(p.x, p.y);
00070         if (change) {
00071             mmlpix.repaint();
00072             Refresh();
00073         }
00074         }
00075 }
00076 void
00077 MathMLView::OnMousePress(wxMouseEvent &e) {
00078     printf("press\n");
00079         SetFocus();
00080         if (doc) {
00081         float x = e.GetX()/m_scale;
00082         float y = e.GetY()/m_scale;
00083         wxPoint p = mmlpix.getCoords((int)x, (int)y);
00084                 ConstMathCursor *c = doc->constcursor();
00085         bool change;
00086                 if (e.ShiftDown()) {
00087                         change = c->selectTo(x, y);
00088                 } else {
00089             printf("moving\n");
00090                         change = c->moveTo(x, y);
00091                 }
00092         if (change) {
00093             printf("changed\n");
00094             mmlpix.repaint();
00095             Refresh();
00096         }
00097         }
00098 }
00099 // the event tables connect the wxWindows events with the functions (event
00100 // handlers) which process them.
00101 BEGIN_EVENT_TABLE(MathMLView, wxWindow)
00102         EVT_PAINT  (MathMLView::OnPaint)
00103         EVT_MOTION (MathMLView::OnMouseMove)
00104         EVT_LEFT_DOWN (MathMLView::OnMousePress)
